attributes.action: award the town of Wootton Bassett royal status.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The town of Wootton Bassett has been exemplary in its public mourning of Afghan heroes and as an aknowledgement of the support given to bereaved military families I feel it would be entirely fitting and appropriate to award the town royal status thus changing it to Royal Wootton Bassett.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
